mapper.select: SELECT SECTION_CD as "sectionCd" , COMPANY_CD as "company.companyCd", SECTION_PLACE_CD as "sectionPlace.sectionPlaceCd" FROM M_SECTION WHERE SECTION_CD = #{sectionCd} AND (COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd} OR COMPANY_CD='ALL') AND VALID_START_DATE <= #{validStartDate} AND VALID_END_DATE >= #{validStartDate}
